Name: The Revenge of Johnny Bonasera: Episode 2
About the game: Hilarious adventure game in cartoon style. ** MORE THAN 3 TIMES LONGER THAN EPISODE 1!! ** This is the episode two of The Revenge of Johnny Bonasera. Following the abduction of Johnny's mother by aliens, Johnny is questioned at the police station about the events. Johnny must find a plan to rescue his mother and escape from the police station where he is being held. Meanwhile, Captain Wachimolete will try to kill the aliens in his own way. Aliens do not know the mess they have gotten into. Features 2D HD graphics in TV cartoon style. A story driven adventure full of hilarious dialogues and puzzles. Outlandish characters to talk, interact, beat... Available in English, Russian, German, Spanish and Italian. NOTE: Episode 3 is under development. If you liked the game, you can leave a nice comment to motivate the team.
